channel.title: Silvio Waisbord on Tiago Ventura
channel.description: Recent content in Silvio Waisbord on Tiago Ventura

item.title: Winning! Election Returns and Engagement in Social Media
item.description: This article analyzes social media engagement when elections are adjudicated to one of the contending parties. We extend existing models of political dialogue to explain differences in social media engagement (i.e. time-to-retweet) when users support the winner or losers of an election.
